newsitem.title: USA: GOLF-LEADING SCORES AT ST. JUDE CLASSIC.
newsitem.headline: GOLF-LEADING SCORES AT ST. JUDE CLASSIC.

text.p: Leading scores
at the $1.5 million St. Jude Classic when second-round play
was suspended Friday with 103 golfers yet to complete the
round (players U.S. unless stated):
10 under - Gene Sauers 65, 4 under after 17
9 under - Greg Norman (Australia) 68 65
8 under - Jay Don Blake 70 64, Tommy Armour 67 67, Charlie
Rymer 71, 8 under after 17
7 under - Peter Jordan 69 66, Michael Bradley 68 67, Skip
Kendall 68 67
6 under - John Adams 70 66, Jay Haas 70 66, Guy Boros 67 69,
Ted Tryba 68 68, Fuzzy Zoeller 69 67, Nick Price (Zimbabwe)
66, 1 under after 2, Robert Damron 65, yet to tee off
Add international players
4 under - Bradley Hughes (Australia) 67, yet to tee off
3 under - Rafael Alarcon (Mexico) 71, 3 under after 15,
Fulton Allem (South Africa) 68, even after 1, Craig Parry
(Australia) 68, 1 under after 4
even - David Frost (South Africa) 70, 1 over after 2
1 over - Gabriel Hjertstedt (Sweden) 72, still to tee off
2 over - Hideki Kase (Japan) 70, 3 over after 15
4 over - Phil Tataurangi (New Zealand) 75, still to tee off
